name: Color Splice
description:
Description

Color Splice is a short puzzle game about connecting colored dots. The goal is to find a partner for every dot. The further you progress, the more chaotic the screen will become. While creating connections, be careful not to obscure the remaining dots.

Choose from a wide variety of palettes to best suit your style. Everything from elegant and delicious colors to hardcore or eye-piercing for the daring. There are even options for the color blind.

Game made during Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

Theme of the jam: Let There be Chaos

Controls

Left mouse button to create a connection between dots and interact with UI.

Right mouse button, space or escape to pause the game.

F11 to toggle fullscreen.
